name: Personal Trainer Site
overwiew: My first commercial project. Deployed on GitHub Pages with custom domain. I didn't need any back-end technology for this amount of data, which is stored in JSON file. Site is scalable on mobile devices. Design is atypical, eye-catching. E-mail form on site is supported by third-party site: Formspree.

name: Weather App
overwiew: The page on which the map of voivodships is placed in the SVG format, and current weather data is marked on it. Just click on a province and the data will be displayed. The user's location is also downloaded to display the current weather in his town. There is an option to search for a city via a text box.

name: Hotline Portfolio
overwiew: A bit unstable and high performance project, but an aesthetic experience is great. I'm planning to refactor whole code with help of Typescript, Webpack and Babel.

name: Calculator
overwiew: It's a simple, responsive javascript calculator. I builded it with React.js and Math.js. In this challenge, I had the biggest problem with user input. I had to catch all possible inputs and adjust algorithm to work well with them.

name: flip Game
overwiew: Choose your difficulty level and play!

name: Pomodoro-Clock
overwiew: A Clock which will help you to organise your working routine. This method is known all over the world. How it works? Firstly, you need to choose your break-time length and work-time length. Then you just need to start. You have four working sessions and four intervals. Last interval duration is 30 minutes. This whole process is called 'Pomodoro'. After last pause, you can start again.
